import{ToastContainer,toast}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";// 1. Ham xu ly in gia san pham co dau cham o giua
export var editPrice=function editPrice(str){return str.slice(-10,-6)+"."+str.slice(-6,-3)+"."+str.slice(-3);};// 2. Validate User dang ky nhan vao fullname, email, password, phone
export var validateUserSignUp=function validateUserSignUp(obj){var userArr=localStorage.getItem("userArr")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userArr")):[];var regex=/^\w+([\.-]?\w+)*@\w+([\.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/;// check email hop le
if(obj.fullname===""){//khong nhap fullname
toast.error("Please input your name");return false;}if(obj.email===""){//khong nhap email
toast.error("please input your email !");return false;}if(!regex.test(obj.email)){// email khong hop le
toast.error("Your email is not valid");return false;}for(var i=0;i<userArr.length;i++){// kiem tra email da ton tai chua
if(obj.email===userArr[i].email){toast.error("Email is already exists ! Try another email ! ");return false;}}if(obj.password.length<8){// password it hon 8 ky tu
// pass < 8 ky tu
toast.error("Password is must at least 8 characters");return false;}toast.success("Sign up completed !");return true;};//3 Validate Sign In
export var validateSignInUser=function validateSignInUser(obj){var userArr=localStorage.getItem("userArr")?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userArr")):[];if(obj.email===""){//khong nhap email
toast.error("Please input your email !");return false;}if(obj.password===""){// khong nhap pass
toast.error("Please input your password");return false;}for(var i=0;i<userArr.length;i++){if(userArr[i].email===obj.email){// co email
if(obj.password===userArr[i].password){// sai pass
toast.success("Login completed");return true;}else{toast.error("Wrong password");return false;}}}toast.error("Wrong email");return false;};// 4. Ham tinh tong gia tri cac san pham trong gio hang
export var TotalPrice=function TotalPrice(arr){var total=0;for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){total=total+arr[i].price*arr[i].quantity;}return total;};export var TotalPriceObj=function TotalPriceObj(obj){return obj.price*obj.quantity;};
